name: Dennis N. SAKELSON and Gloria Sakelson, his wife v. Ralph ROMEO and Regina Romeo, his wife, Appellants

parties: Dennis N. SAKELSON and Gloria Sakelson, his wife v. Ralph ROMEO and Regina Romeo, his wife, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Application for Summary Relief granted. Order of Superior Court vacated and case remanded to Court of Common Pleas of Montgomery County for proceedings consistent with Brogan, Inc. v. Holmes Electric Protective Co. of Philadelphia, 501 Pa. 234, 460 A.2d 1093 (1983), with direction that supersedeas bond posted by appellants remain in effect until further order of the trial court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert K. Duffy, Hatboro, for appellants.
Donald A. Semisch, Willow Grove, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
468 A.2d 450
Dennis N. SAKELSON and Gloria Sakelson, his wife v. Ralph ROMEO and Regina Romeo, his wife, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 11, 1983.
Robert K. Duffy, Hatboro, for appellants.
Donald A. Semisch, Willow Grove, for appellees.
